item.title: Ghost of Yotei: How to Access Oni's Breath Inn (Riddle Solutions)
item.description:
The Oni's Breath Inn in Ghost of Yotei has a strict policy, and if Atsu wants to enter to drink sake or question patrons about the Yotei Six, then she's going to need to know how to get inside without drawing a blade. Even worse for Atsu is that inside the Oni's Breath Inn requires a sharp mind instead of a sharp sword, so if players want to make sure that they hit all the right answers for the riddles, then they can check out the solutions to them found right here!

How to Enter Oni's Breath Inn in Ghost of Yotei

The Oni's Breath Inn is located in the east region of Ishikari Plain within the Urara Forest. However, once you approach the main entrance, a bouncer will block your path and tell you that you need to be wearing a mask. To put on a mask, hit the Options Button on your controller and head over to Gear, where you can equip a face covering mask. If you do not have a mask that's accepted by the bouncer, then you can get one for free close by. To the right of the entrance of the Oni's Breath Inn is a Bamboo Strike activity, and upon completing it, the spectators will leave you the Shattered Demon Mask that you can wear to cover your face and enter the inn.

All Oni's Breath Inn Riddle Answers in Ghost of Yotei

Once you're inside Oni's Breath Inn, you'll find a raider sitting on his own at the back. This raider will invite you to drink with him, but there's a catch. If you get a riddle wrong, you drink, but if you get a riddle right, he drinks. The raider will ask three riddles, and here's the answer to each of them:

  • " Feed me and I live. Quench my thirst and I die. What am I? "
    • Answer: Fire.

  • " I have eyes when I have company. I am blind when I am alone. "
    • Answer: Mask.

  • " I am real within you. I am but a story around you. "
    • Answer: Demon.

After answering all of the riddles, you might think it's time to leave, but in fact, the raider will single you out as the Onryo. This will then begin a showdown with the raider outside, and an entire fight with the rest of the raiders, so you'd best be prepared for a battle. After, the Oni's Breath Inn will be available as a fast travel point.

9.5 /10
10 /10

Ghost of Yotei

item.title: Zombie Waves Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Zombie Waves is a great example of an entertaining time-killer with an interesting setting, mechanics, and concept that will keep you playing for days or even months. Here, you play the role of a survivor in the zombie apocalypse and have to fight back against the undead, improving your weapons, level, and talents, as well as creating unique skill sets.

By redeeming Zombie Waves codes, you will receive generous rewards from the developers that will help you progress in the game faster. Each code offers useful rewards like resources and currency that will definitely come in handy, so don't neglect it.

Updated October 2, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Zombie Waves includes a wide range of codes that provide handy rewards to support your survival. These rewards can give you boosts, items, or other helpful resources as you fight through waves of the undead. Using them regularly can make your progress smoother and more efficient. Keep checking back for updates, as more codes are often released.

All Zombie Waves Codes

Regardless of your progress in this exciting game, redeeming Zombie Waves codes will always be a nice bonus. It's a convenient and easy method to quickly earn currency and other stuff, so take advantage of this opportunity.

How to Redeem Codes for Zombie Waves

Fortunately, Zombie Waves ’s redemption system is quite simple and available directly in the game, so the whole process will take you a few clicks. However, if you have any difficulties redeeming Zombie Waves codes, or you don't know how it works, here is a detailed guide:

  • Launch Zombie Waves .
  • Pay attention to the upper-left corner of the screen. Your avatar will be located there. Click on it.
  • After doing so, you will open a new menu with basic information about your account. Also, you will see the Bundle Code button below this menu. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and two buttons, Cancel and Exchange. Now, enter manually or, better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Exchange button to send your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Zombie Waves Codes

To find more Roblox codes, you need to visit the game's official social media pages. Here, along with other content, the developers often share codes, so you may be lucky enough to find them and be one of the first to receive rewards:

  • Official Zombie Waves Discord server.
  • Official Zombie Waves Facebook page.

Zombie Waves is available on mobile games.

item.title: Ghost of Yotei: Difficulty Setting Differences
item.description:
Ghost of Yotei offers players multiple difficulty settings from the very onset of the game, allowing them to experience Atsu's adventure as they see fit. The choice to pick a difficulty setting is presented at the very start of this journey, but this can be changed later on at any time.

Players interested in knowing how the difficulty settings change the experience will want to know the ins and outs of these settings, especially those who have not played Ghost of Tsushima before Ghost of Yotei . Making an informed decision about which option suits them the best requires understanding the changes being made in the first place. Here's the breakdown.

Looking for everything Ezo has to offer? Check out our complete Ghost of Yotei Interactive Map!

All Difficulty Settings in Ghost of Yotei

There are five main difficulty settings in Ghost of Yotei .

Difficulty

In-Game Description

Effect

Casual

Enjoy Atsu's story and explore Ezo with the lowest combat challenge.

Atsu takes very little damage and deals a lot of damage. Enemy aggression is lowered to the minimum level, which means there is a lot of downtime between attacks, even when surrounded by a group. They very rarely block or parry attacks or use special moves. Stagger threshold is lowered, allowing even regular attacks to break the enemy's poise meter in one hit.

Easy

Experience Atsu's story and explore Ezo with minimal challenge.

Enemies occasionally use blue glint and red glint attacks, have increased stagger, and are more aggressive. The damage Atsu receives is slightly increased as well. Parry and dodge timing is very generous. Perfect for beginners to Ghost of Yotei .

Medium

A well-rounded gameplay experience with moderate challenge.

The most balanced game mode. Atsu deals and receives roughly the same amount of damage. Enemy aggression is moderate, and they use all special moves at their disposal. Parries require precise timing.

Hard

For those unafraid of death and brave enough to face considerable challenge.

Enemies hit much harder, dealing roughly half of Atsu's health on regular attacks and nearly 90% on special moves. Enemy aggression is very high, and parry timings are unforgiving.

Lethal

Death is always close at hand. A single sword strike is lethal.

Damage is massively increased across the board, making it so that one or two attacks are all it takes to face defeat. This holds true for both Atsu and her enemies, meaning combat encounters are decided very quickly. Works the same way as Ghost of Tsushima 's Lethal mode.

Despite what the flavor text for Lethal mode says, a single sword strike is not lethal in this setting. It only means the damage is increased by a significant margin. Increasing Atsu's health by visiting Hot Springs will allow you to sustain more hits in fights.

Custom Difficulty Setting Options in Ghost of Yotei

Ghost of Yotei also allows players to pick a custom difficulty, picking and choosing individual elements from Easy, Medium, Hard, and Lethal modes to suit their preference. There are five adjustable settings in total:

  • Enemy Aggression: Modifies the frequency and speed of enemy attacks.
  • Timing Windows: Modifies the timing required for parries and dodges.
  • Enemy Damage: Scales the amount of damage inflicted by enemies.
  • Stealth: Scales detection time, enemy vision, and pursuit behaviors.
  • Hero Bonus Perks: Modifies Spirit gain rates and bonus perks from specific difficulties.

Atsu's increased damage, as seen in Lethal difficulty, is dictated by Hero Bonus Perks.

So, for example, if a player wants to keep the lethal damage levels for both Atsu and her enemies from Lethal mode but prefers more generous parry windows, moderate enemy aggression, and easy Stealth, they'll choose the following settings:

  • Enemy Aggression: Medium
  • Timing Windows: Medium/Hard
  • Enemy Damage: Lethal
  • Stealth: Easy
  • Hero Bonus Perks: Lethal

Any combination of these settings is possible, allowing players to tailor the difficulty for their own enjoyment as much as they want.

How to Change Difficulty in Ghost of Yotei

Difficulty can be changed at any time from the main menu of Ghost of Yotei .

  • Pause the game by pressing the "Options" button on the PS5 controller.
  • Select Gameplay > Difficulty , and choose your preferred option.
    • Custom difficulty option will be added below the Difficulty toggle if it is selected.

All changes will be applied immediately, and doing so does not require exiting or reloading the game.

Should You Choose Lethal Difficulty in Ghost of Yotei?

Lethal mode is great for immersion and role-playing as a true, blue samurai-style fighter in Ghost of Yotei . Fights tend to end quickly and feel a lot more cinematic as a result. As a downside, however, it requires players to get very good at timing their parries and dodges, punishing mistakes in brutal fashion.

Luckily, since Ghost of Yotei 's auto-save function is very active, you don't lose much progress when Atsu dies. Additionally, Lethal mode is not a direct increase in difficulty. In fact, players who get the timings down will find Lethal mode easier than Hard difficulty . Since Atsu's attacks hit harder, enemies go down quickly, meaning there is less chance of getting swarmed by groups of high-health enemies who can overwhelm you.

The only instance where this does not hold true is in boss fights. Even with Lethal mode on, it's not possible to defeat a boss in one or two hits; you need to consistently parry, dodge, or stagger these enemies to come out victorious.

Is There a Difficulty-Related Trophy in Ghost of Yotei?

No, there is not. Sucker Punch has not implemented any difficulty-locked trophy for Ghost of Yotei on release. Completionists looking to achieve platinum status in the game can do so even with casual difficulty.

There are a total of 54 trophies in Ghost of Yotei , most of which are locked behind story and overworld progression, while some require players to perform certain special actions with Atsu.

9.5 /10
10 /10

Ghost of Yotei

item.title: Crow Genzo Bounty Guide in Ghost of Yotei (Where to Find Crow Genzo)
item.description:
Bounties in Ghost of Yotei are a reliable way of earning Coins . Coins can be used to purchase items, maps, and upgrades, so completing these bounties early on can help Atsu's journey quite a bit. Most of these bounties do not take much time, but locating their exact position on the map can be a bit confusing. Here is a full walkthrough of the Crow Genzo Bounty and what players need to do to complete this bounty and earn their reward in Ghost of Yotei .

Crow Genzo Bounty Guide in Ghost of Yotei

How to Start Crow Genzo Bounty in Ghost of Yotei

To start this Bounty , players must first progress through the prologue and reach the Inn to complete a small story segment there, where you will have to deal with Saito's men. Once you wake up the next day, you can leave the Inn to find a Bounty Board on your left and Kojiro sitting next to it. There will be three bounty posters here, one of which is Crow Genzo . The location mentioned for this assassin is near the Jade Grove .

Where to Find Crow Genzo in Ghost of Yotei

Start riding northwest on your horse, and since you have the bounty picked up, you will see the name of the location in yellow. Track the location on the map to make it easier for you to ride there. Once you arrive at the Jade Grove , you will be able to Camp if you want. There are a few Mushrooms in the area as well that you can collect and cook.

Setting up camp allows you to regain your Spirit and do quite a few things, such as sleep, cook, play songs, and even meet wandering NPCs.

Regardless of whether or not you set up a camp here, you can start going North of this location and will soon arrive at the Blue-Flowered Cemetery . Head inside and go straight towards the Altar you can see in the distance. Here, you will have a one-on-one fight against Crow Genzo . If you are successful in beating him, you will get the Metsubushi , which is a Quickfire Weapon .

Even though the bounty will be completed here, you will be interrupted by three enemies who want the bounty for themselves. Deal with them, and you can then interact with the Altar of Reflection behind you to get a free Skill Point . You can head back to Kojiro to get 750 Coins as a reward for completing this bounty.

9.5 /10
10 /10

Ghost of Yotei

item.title: Roblox: Arena Royale Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Arena Royale is a lot like Clash Royale , in which you also have to fight in the arena. But unlike the original, you control a specific character, so you have to work in a team to win. To unlock new units, you will need a lot of Trophies, which, fortunately, can be earned using Arena Royale codes.

As expected from Roblox codes, they contain various rewards. Among them can be both Trophies with Gems and boosters. But due to the short activity period, they can be easily missed.

Updated October 2, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Arena Royale doesn’t have any active codes available at the moment. This means there aren’t any free rewards to claim right now. Be sure to check back regularly, since the developers often release new codes and bonuses during updates or special events. Staying updated will help you grab rewards as soon as they become available.

All Arena Royale Codes

Working Arena Royale Codes

  • No active codes.

Expired Arena Royale Codes

  • Progress
  • 10kDiscordMembers!!!
  • GizzSucksInClashRoyale
  • okki3
  • YoUpdates
  • SorryForShutdowns
  • oki2
  • EvolutionWizardBalanced
  • LarryWillComeBack!
  • MegaKnightFixYay
  • SkeletonKing
  • IhateStupidFireCracker
  • NerfEvoFurnance
  • ALMOST3MVISITS!!!
  • Clash Royal
  • FixTheFreakingEvoMegaKnight
  • Plzcode
  • NerfEvoKnight
  • FreeProgress
  • 200KVisits
  • 600KVisits
  • Princess
  • 200KVisits
  • oki
  • 300KVisits
  • EvaseisAnOpp
  • Peak
  • 1MVisits

Arena Royale has dynamic gameplay where you have to choose one of two teams and immediately enter the battle. Depending on the collected Elixir, you can choose different units and spawn them in the arena. As in the original, the condition for victory is the destruction of the enemy fort. However, at first, you have quite a few characters available. And to unlock new ones, you have to earn a lot of currencies. Usually, this can be done by winning matches, but there is a faster way, namely Arena Royale codes.

Each such code grants players valuable rewards from the developers. Most of them contain Gems or Trophies, but some can also give you temporary boosters. It is worth noting that you will want to hurry to use the codes, as they can expire fast.

How to Redeem Arena Royale Codes

To use Arena Royale codes, you just need to make a few clicks. Fortunately, this feature works as simply as in most other Roblox games. And for your convenience, you can follow these steps:

  • First, launch Arena Royale .
  • Next, open Settings by clicking on the gear icon in the upper left corner of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code in the appropriate field.
  • Finally, click the Redeem button to get your well-deserved rewards.

How to Get More Arena Royale Codes

If you want to get fresh Arena Royale codes as soon as they are released, you should bookmark this guide. We are going to update this guide as soon as the developers add new goodies. In addition, you can visit the official social media pages of the developers to get all the news first-hand:

  • Shad Studios! Roblox group
  • Arena Royale Discord server
